post.text: We are not going to criminalize, profile, round up, and deport 16 million people.

comment.author: Cody
comment.text: What will it take to get rid of this woman. We have corruption running for President. I can only hope Our Lord and savior is as fed up with her as we are.

replies.author: Ryan
replies.text: So you're supporting the thrice married adulterous leach? Ok go ahead and run with your hypocrisy.
